title: 04/30/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/30/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, it’s a post NFL Draft First Round recap as DP and the guys discuss what went down last night. Chris Simms from NBC Sports joined in the first round to talk about how the 49ers made a risky pick, Mac Jones landing with the Patriots, and more. MikeTirico called in to talk about this weekend’s Kentucky Derby as well as talking about part of the draft. Lastly, Dan Orlovsky joined to talk about the Aaron Rodgers situation and how the Bears got one of the best picks in the night

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
